forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. SE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
